data.Title: Microsoft Partners with StopNCII to Combat Revenge Porn and Deepfakes on Bing
data.Description: Microsoft is taking steps to address the spread of non-consensual intimate images, including deepfakes, on its Bing search engine. The company has partnered with StopNCII to proactively remove such harmful content using digital hashes provided by victims.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Concludes
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update has finished rolling out after 19 days. Initial observations from industry experts suggest a mixed bag of results, with some websites experiencing positive ranking improvements while others saw significant drops.

data.Title: OpenAI's SearchGPT Faces Early Criticism
data.Description: Early users of OpenAI's SearchGPT, a prototype aiming to challenge Google's search dominance, have reported mixed experiences. While some praise its potential, others point out limitations in handling shopping and local queries, as well as instances of inaccurate or fabricated information.

data.Title: Google Tests New Forum Display in Search Results
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new search interface for forum results, aiming to improve user experience. The updated layout features prominent displays of top comments and links to related discussions within the forum.

data.Title: SEO Experts Emphasize Holistic Strategies for Online Growth
data.Description: Industry leaders are urging businesses to move beyond focusing solely on traffic acquisition and prioritize a comprehensive approach to online growth. This includes optimizing user experience, improving conversion rates, and building long-term customer value.
